item.description:
You'd think that people would have had enough of silly love songs.

Whether you think "Love Is A Many Splendored Thing", "Love to Love You Baby", or "Love Stinks", come out, get together, and sing your song. DJ Todd is an ace KJ, and looks forward to seeing us. Karaoke starts at 10, but DJ Todd will be happy to let us look over his extensive song list early.

No formal warm-up for this one, just come out and sing.

Love to hear you baby!

Shihan Scott A.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask when you come in, look for my smiling face, look for tables with a sign on them.
item.name: Silly Love Songs (or any others) for Valentine's Day Eve!
